name: activepieces
description: Activepieces is an open-source, no-code workflow automation platform that lets teams build automations and AI workflows with drag-and-drop logic. Users can self-host or use the cloud version, and integrate with 400+ apps to automate business workflows.

features.title: No
features.description: Build powerful workflows with visual drag-and-drop tools. No programming required

features.title: 400+ Integrations
features.description: Connect popular apps to streamline business processes. Everything works together

features.title: Ai
features.description: Create intelligent, adaptive workflows with AI capabilities. Automation that thinks

features.title: Flexible Hosting
features.description: Choose self-hosting for control or cloud for convenience. Deploy your way

features.title: Visual Designer
features.description: Design complex workflows through intuitive visual interface. See your logic flow

features.title: Custom Actions
features.description: Create tailored triggers and actions for specific needs. Unlimited possibilities

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Multiple members can build and manage workflows together. Shared productivity

features.title: Open Source
features.description: Extend functionality with community contributions and custom code. Truly flexible platform
